dmca.title: [ABUSE] www.fortisnv.com/Planet
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, September 15, 2004 4:25 PM
To: Jane.ALTINGSIBERG@fortis.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Re: [ABUSE] www.fortisnv.com/Planet

Your email is being sent to our legal counsel for consideration.
--
Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


Jane.ALTINGSIBERG@fortis.com wrote:
> Dear Sirs,
> 
> 
> On behalf of Ph.H. Povel, please find enclosed a letter in case of 
> www.fortisnv.com
> 
>  <<04-035sombf Planet15-09-04.doc>> 
> 
> With kind regards,
> Jane Alting Siberg
> Secretary of Fortis Group Legal & Tax and Fortis Compliance
> Tel. +31 (0)30 226 33 72
> Fax +31 (0)30 226 99 25
> U01.18.14
> Room 18.63
> jane.altingsiberg@fortis.com
> 
> The above phone numbers changed recently.
> Some technical difficulties may occur when calling from abroad; 
> if the above numbers can not be reached, please dial
> +31 (0)30 278 06 21 or +31 (0)30 257 79 25 when using the fax.
>

dmca.principal_name: Fortis Group Legal & Tax and Fortis Compliance
